trans-unit.source: Implements an ASP.NET module that processes session cookies in WS-Federation scenarios.
trans-unit.target: Implementa um módulo ASP.NET que processa os cookies de sessão em cenários de WS-Federation.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A> property is set to `false` and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property is initialized to a default instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A>propriedade está definida como `false` e a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>propriedade é inicializada para uma instância predefinida de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>classe.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.IsReferenceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Authenticates the incoming request by validating the incoming session token.
trans-unit.target: Autentica o pedido de entrada ao validar o token de sessão recebidos.

trans-unit.source: Upon successful validation, it updates the current HTTP context and thread principal with the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Após a validação com êxito, atualiza o contexto HTTP atual e o thread principal com especificado <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken é chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: It calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A> method to validate the incoming token and update the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Chama o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A>método para validar o token de entrada e atualize o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SetPrincipalFromSessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `writeCookie` parameter is `true`, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A> method is invoked to write the session token to a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Se o `writeCookie` parâmetro é `true`, a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A>método é invocado para escrever o token de sessão para um cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.WriteSessionTokenToCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token to use to authenticate the incoming HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão para utilizar para autenticar o pedido de HTTP recebido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write the session cookie; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>escrever o cookie de sessão; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a session cookie is in the specified cookie collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um cookie de sessão na coleção de cookie especificada.

trans-unit.source: The collection of cookies in which to search.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de cookies que pretende procurar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a session cookie is found; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se não for encontrado um cookie de sessão; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: httpCookieCollection is null
trans-unit.target: httpCookieCollectioné nulo

trans-unit.source: Gets the active <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> for the current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o Active Directory <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> para atual <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The active session security token.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão ativa.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cookie handler that is used to read, write, and delete session cookies.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o processador de cookie que é utilizado para ler, escrever e eliminar cookies de sessão.

trans-unit.source: The CookieHandler property is initialized by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de CookieHandler é inicializada pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializePropertiesFromConfiguration%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method initializes the property based on the cookie handler specified on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration> object that is set on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Este método inicializa a propriedade com base no processador de cookie especificado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>objeto que está definido no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration>

trans-unit.source: You can set the cookie handler in a configuration file through the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir o processador de cookie num ficheiro de configuração através de [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: O processador de cookie.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from the specified parameters by using the configured session token handler.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> dos parâmetros especificados utilizando o processador de token de sessão configurados.

trans-unit.source: The principal to be captured in the token.
trans-unit.target: O principal para serem capturadas no token.

trans-unit.source: An application-defined context string.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de contexto definido pela aplicação.

trans-unit.source: The first instant in which this token is valid.
trans-unit.target: A primeiro instantâneas em que este token é válido.

trans-unit.source: The last instant in which this token is valid.
trans-unit.target: A última instantâneas em que este token é válido.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value should be persisted by the user agent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o valor deve ser mantido pelo agente do utilizador; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The session token.
trans-unit.target: O token de sessão.

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: Não é um processador de token de sessão válido configurado.

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>propriedade.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Deletes the session cookie and removes it from the cache.
trans-unit.target: Elimina o cookie de sessão e remove-o partir da cache.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the session cookie by using the cookie handler specified by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Elimina o cookie de sessão utilizando o processador de cookie especificado pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called during sign-out by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado durante a fim de sessão pelo <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module and prepares it to handle events from the module's [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] application object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o módulo e prepara-o para processar eventos a partir do módulo [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] objeto da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Adds the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A> handlers to the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> events of the application object specified by the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A>processadores para a <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>eventos do objeto de aplicação especificado pelo `context` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnPostAuthenticateRequest%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HTTP application object that contains this module.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de aplicação de HTTP que contém este módulo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the module properties based on definitions in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa as propriedades do módulo com base nas definições no ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property from the handler specified in configuration by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName> object that is set on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>propriedade de processador especificado na configuração, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName>objeto que está definido no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthentication.FederationConfiguration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.Configuration.FederationConfiguration?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the cookie handler in a configuration file through the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar o processador de cookie num ficheiro de configuração através de [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the session information (claim values, etc.) should be stored in the session cookie or whether the session content should be stored on the server side, using the cookie to store just a reference.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica se as informações da sessão (os valores de afirmação, etc.) devem ser armazenadas no cookie de sessão ou se o conteúdo de sessão deve ser armazenado no lado do servidor, utilizando o cookie para armazenar apenas uma referência.

trans-unit.source: In reference mode, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> is stored in a server-side cache (an object that derives from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>).
trans-unit.target: No modo de referência, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>são armazenadas na cache do lado do servidor (um objeto que deriva de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache>).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenCache> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>

trans-unit.source: The issued cookie just contains a context identifier that is used to retrieve the token from the cache.
trans-unit.target: O cookie emitido apenas contém um identificador de contexto, que é utilizado para obter o token da cache.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > To operate in reference mode, Microsoft recommends providing a handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName> event in the global.asax.cs file and setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the token passed in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Para funcionar no modo de referência, a Microsoft recomenda a fornecer um processador para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName>eventos global.asax.cs e definição de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade no token transmitido a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.IsReferenceMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This will ensure that the session token operates in reference mode for every request and is favored over merely setting the IsReferenceMode property on the Session Authentication Module.
trans-unit.target: Isto irá garantir que o token de sessão funciona no modo de referência para cada pedido e favored através de simplesmente a definição da propriedade IsReferenceMode no módulo de autenticação de sessão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if issued cookies are in reference mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se forem emitidos cookies no modo de referência caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which specifies that issued cookies are not in reference mode.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, que especifica que emitiu os cookies não estejam no modo de referência.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest"></xref> event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Processa o <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest"> </xref> evento o [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

trans-unit.source: This method does the following: 1.
trans-unit.target: Este método faz o seguinte: 1.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> method to read a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> from the session cookie, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>método para ler um <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>do cookie de sessão, se estiver presente.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.TryReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a session security token cannot be read (most likely because a session has not been established), return.
trans-unit.target: Se uma sessão de token de segurança não pode ser de leitura (provavelmente, porque não tiver sido estabelecida uma sessão), devolver.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A>método para aumentar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>eventos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenReceived%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides an opportunity for the token read from the cookie to be modified or for the request to be canceled.
trans-unit.target: Isto fornece uma oportunidade para o token de leitura a partir do cookie a modificação ou para o pedido ser cancelado.

trans-unit.source: The handler can also specify that the token should be reissued, by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: O processador também pode especificar que o token deve ser emitido novamente, definindo o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenReceivedEventArgs.ReissueCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the token is to be reissued, removes it from the cache and invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A> method to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: Se o token é ser emitido novamente, remove-o partir da cache e invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A>método para aumentar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>eventos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSessionSecurityTokenCreated%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides opportunity for the token to again be modified.
trans-unit.target: Isto proporciona a oportunidade para o token de novamente ser modificados.

trans-unit.source: The reissue behavior can also be modified by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de voltar a emitir também pode ser modificado, definindo o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o processador de eventos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>método para autenticar o utilizador.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: If successful, this has the effect of setting the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to the principal that is contained in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the incoming token.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver êxito, tem o efeito da definição de <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para o principal que está contido no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade do token de entrada.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken.ClaimsPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the session has expired, invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se a sessão expirou, invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The OnAuthenticateRequest method is added to the handlers for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> event in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método OnAuthenticateRequest é adicionado aos processadores de <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>evento no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.AuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source for the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem para o evento.

trans-unit.source: This will be an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Este será um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: Não é um processador de token de sessão válido configurado.

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>propriedade.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Handles the <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest"></xref> event from the [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Processa o <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest"> </xref> evento o [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] pipeline.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation is empty.
trans-unit.target: A implementação predefinida está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The OnPostAuthenticateRequest handler is added to the handlers for the <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName> event in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O processador de OnPostAuthenticateRequest é adicionado aos processadores de <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>evento no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.InitializeModule%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpApplication.PostAuthenticateRequest?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The source for the event.
trans-unit.target: A origem para o evento.

trans-unit.source: This will be an <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Este será um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplication"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignedOut"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignedOut"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method after the sign-out has been performed and the session cookie has been deleted.
trans-unit.target: Este método é invocado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método após o início de sessão foi efetuado e o cookie de sessão foi eliminado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SigningOut"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SigningOut"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method to perform sign-out.
trans-unit.target: Este método é invocado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método para efetuar a fim de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is invoked before the session cookie is deleted.
trans-unit.target: É invocado antes do cookie de sessão é eliminado.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This method is invoked from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method if an error occurs during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: Este método é invocado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método se ocorrer um erro durante a fim de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para o evento.

trans-unit.source: Reads a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from the specified session cookie.
trans-unit.target: Lê um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> a partir do cookie de sessão especificado.

trans-unit.source: The cookie, in raw form, that contains the session token.
trans-unit.target: O cookie, no formato não processado, que contém o token de sessão.

trans-unit.source: The session token that was read from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: O token de sessão que foi lido a partir do cookie.

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: Não é um processador de token de sessão válido configurado.

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>propriedade.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a session security token has been created.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando foi criado um token de segurança de sessão.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to modify the session security token before it is written to a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para modificar o token de segurança de sessão antes de serem gravados num cookie.

trans-unit.source: The SessionSecurityTokenCreated event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been created.
trans-unit.target: O evento de SessionSecurityTokenCreated é gerado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>método depois de um token de sessão (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) foi criado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A>

trans-unit.source: This happens, for example, if an event handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event modifies the token.
trans-unit.target: Isto acontece, por exemplo, se um processador de eventos para o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>eventos modifica o token.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to modify properties of the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar este evento para modificar as propriedades do token de sessão antes de transmitir outras ao longo do pipeline e é utilizado para autenticar a entidade que efetua o pedido (utilizador).

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can access the token through the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Um processador de eventos, pode aceder ao token através de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: After modifying the token, you can ensure that it is written back to the cookie by setting the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de modificar o token, pode garantir que este não é gravado para o cookie definindo a <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Unlike, the SessionSecurityTokenCreated event, SessionSecurityTokenCreated is not a cancelable event.
trans-unit.target: Ao contrário, o evento de SessionSecurityTokenCreated, SessionSecurityTokenCreated não é um evento cancelable.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a session security token has been read from a cookie.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando um token de segurança de sessão lidas a partir do cookie.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Sets the principal on the <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> and <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"></xref> to the principal that is contained in the specified session token.
trans-unit.target: Define o principal do <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Threading.Thread"> </xref> para o principal que está contido no token de sessão especificado.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A> method and sets the <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> using the identities that are returned.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A>método e define o <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade e o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>utilizando as identidades que são devolvidas.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentPrincipal%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ValidateSessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session token from which to set the principal.
trans-unit.target: O token de sessão do qual pretende definir o principal.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the user is signed out.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre depois do utilizador é terminada.

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method just after the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Geradas a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método imediatamente após o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>método é invocado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é garantido ser chamado para cada sessão.

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os cookies podem ser eliminados do lado do cliente, caso em que este evento seria nunca desencadeado porque não há nenhum evento do lado do servidor para eliminar a sessão.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before deleting the sign-in session.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre antes de eliminar o início de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method just before the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Geradas a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método imediatamente antes do <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>método é invocado.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é garantido ser chamado para cada sessão.

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os cookies podem ser eliminados do lado do cliente, caso em que este evento seria nunca desencadeado porque não há nenhum evento do lado do servidor para eliminar a sessão.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Signs the current user out and raises the associated events.
trans-unit.target: Termina a sessão do utilizador atual e gera os eventos associados.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>, and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A> methods to perform sign-out.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A>, e <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A>métodos para realizar a fim de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignedOut%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.DeleteSessionTokenCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSigningOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A> method is invoked to raise the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError> event.
trans-unit.target: Se ocorrer uma exceção, o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A>método é invocado para aumentar o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError>eventos.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOutError> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnSignOutError%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> object passed into the event handler for this event to cancel the sign-out and prevent the exception from being propagated to the client.
trans-unit.target: Pode definir o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs>objeto transmitido para o processador de eventos para este evento cancelar a fim de sessão e impedir que a exceção de que está a ser propagada para o cliente.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to add application-specific behavior.
trans-unit.target: Pode substituir este método para adicionar o comportamento de específicas da aplicação.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when there is an error during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando existe um erro durante a fim de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A> method when an error occurs during sign-out.
trans-unit.target: Geradas a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>método quando ocorre um erro durante a fim de sessão.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SignOut%2A>

trans-unit.source: In an event handler, you can get the exception that resulted in the event being raised from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Um processador de eventos, pode obter a exceção que resultaram de eventos que está a ser geradas a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs.Exception%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can cancel further processing of the exception, which has the result of not propagating the exception to the client, by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Pode cancelar o processamento adicional da exceção, que tem o resultado da não propagar a exceção para o cliente, definindo o <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs>para `true`.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ErrorEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event is not guaranteed to be called for every session.
trans-unit.target: Este evento não é garantido ser chamado para cada sessão.

trans-unit.source: For example, the cookies may be deleted at the client-side, in which case, this event would never be raised because there is no server-side event for deleting the session.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, os cookies podem ser eliminados do lado do cliente, caso em que este evento seria nunca desencadeado porque não há nenhum evento do lado do servidor para eliminar a sessão.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to read a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> from a session cookie and returns a value that indicates whether the session cookie was successfully read.
trans-unit.target: Tenta ler um <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> de um cookie de sessão e devolve um valor que indica se o cookie de sessão foi lido com êxito.

trans-unit.source: Reads the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property and then invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> method to read the token from the cookie.
trans-unit.target: Lê o cookie utilizando o processador de cookie que está configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>propriedade e, em seguida, invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A>método ler o token a partir do cookie.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.ReadSessionTokenFromCookie%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the session security token that was read from the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: Quando este método devolve, contém o token de segurança de sessão que foram lidos o cookie de sessão.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the session cookie was successfully read from the request; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o cookie de sessão foi lida com êxito o pedido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Validates the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> and returns its identities.
trans-unit.target: Valida especificado <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> e devolve as identidades.

trans-unit.source: This method is called from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado a partir de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>método.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.AuthenticateSessionSecurityToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: It invokes the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of the configured session token handler to validate the token and extract its identities.
trans-unit.target: Invoca o <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método do processador de token de sessão configurados para validar o token e extrair as identidades de.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler.ValidateToken%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The token to validate.
trans-unit.target: O token para validar.

trans-unit.source: The collection of identities that are contained in the token.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de identidades que estão contidos no token.

trans-unit.source: The token has expired.
trans-unit.target: O token expirou.

trans-unit.source: The token start time is not yet valid.
trans-unit.target: A hora de início de token ainda não é válida.

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: Não é um processador de token de sessão válido configurado.

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>propriedade.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"></xref> to a session cookie.
trans-unit.target: Escreve especificado <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken"> </xref> para um cookie de sessão.

trans-unit.source: Writes the cookie by using the cookie handler that is configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Escreve o cookie utilizando o processador de cookie que está configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.CookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token to write.
trans-unit.target: O token de segurança de sessão para escrita.

trans-unit.source: sessionToken is .
trans-unit.target: sessionTokenis .

trans-unit.source: There is not a valid session token handler configured.
trans-unit.target: Não é um processador de token de sessão válido configurado.

trans-unit.source: (There is no <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"></xref> configured in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*> property.)
trans-unit.target: (Não existe nenhum <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityTokenHandler"> </xref> configurado no <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>propriedade.)</xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlers*>
